title: Times Square [1980 - USA] NYC punk girl runaways
description:
Times Square (1980 - USA)

Drama / Music
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0081635/


Made on location in the tough areas of New York City, in streets
lined with porno cinemas, sex shops and shady clubs.

Times Square tells the tale of two misfit runaway girls, from opposite sides of the tracks. Struggling for purpose and belonging, bucking against the ties that bind, they form a band and a movement under the moniker The Sleez Sisters. Championed by radio deejay Johnny LaGuardia, the girls screech through town, wreaking havoc and shining an unwavering spotlight on a grimy and neglected neighbourhood. The plot of the film embodies a punk rock ethic of misunderstood youth articulating their frustrations toward adult authority through music. For a long time the soundtrack album of this film was the only available recording of the The Ramones' song I Wanna Be Sedated.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 720x464, 23.976 fps, 01h50m48s
Audio: AAC, 48000 Hz, stereo
Ratio: 1.85:1

DVDRip, English audio, optional subtitles Croatian, Serbian, Spanish
